        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update reference_cascade_rule for core_company reference field on Publisher and Discovery Model tables</description>
        <name>Update cascade rule for company ref</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateCoreCompanyCascade(table, field, rule) {
	var grDict = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	grDict.addQuery('name', table);
	grDict.addQuery('element', field);
	grDict.query();
	if (grDict.getRowCount() === 1 && grDict.next()) {
		grDict.setValue('reference_cascade_rule', rule);
		grDict.update();
	}
}

updateCoreCompanyCascade('samp_sw_publisher', 'manufacturer', 'restrict');
updateCoreCompanyCascade('cmdb_sam_sw_discovery_model', 'norm_publisher', 'clear');]]></script>
